directions_instructions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil; stir in tortellini and return to a boil. Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the tortellini float to the top and the filling is hot, about 3 minutes. Let cool completely.
If necessary, cut fresh mozzarella into 1-inch pieces. Thread Fresh Mozzarella, fresh basil leaves, tortellini and tomatoes onto skewers. Serve with prepared pesto as a dipping sauce.
nutrition_summary: 182 calories; protein 9.8g; carbohydrates 14.7g; fat 9.3g; cholesterol 33.6mg; sodium 221.8mg. Full Nutrition
